name: CARE_COORDINATION
description: This table will contain data relevant to the Ambulatory patient Care Coordination. Currently this is just the Care Coordination note.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID assigned to the patient record. This ID may be encrypted if you have elected to use enterprise reporting's encryption utility.

columns.name: CARE_COORD_NOTE_ID
columns.description: Stores the ID of the Care Coordination note.
